app_detail:
Let's play this beautiful and exciting piano, a game that will eliminate your boredom, there are many choices of songs on this piano, the features are complete.

How to play:
Touch the blue tile to the advantage using your fingers full of controls, enjoy while adjusting the rhythm of the song.
New piano song:
- Cositas Ricas
- Es Una Loca

This piano can be updated according to the number of requests.
denial:
Piano is just entertainment, no related copyright element is made specifically for piano lovers.

Good luck playing, good luck.
